about_the_game:
Verse Project is an innovative multiplayer space simulator created by a small developer team, that offers players an unparalleled level of immersion in a detailed and expansive universe. The game features an accurate simulation of the Solar System at a 1:1 scale, where all planets, moons, and celestial bodies are placed in their real proportions and orbits.

Experience full immersion in a unified game world without loading screens, where thousands of players interact in real time. Explore space, develop your skills, and participate in events that change the dynamics of the universe.

  • Realistic Solar System: Each planet, moon, and asteroid is in its real orbit at a 1:1 scale.

  • Unified Game World: There are no separate servers or divided worlds—every player coexists in one universe, creating unique stories and affecting the overall picture of events.

  • Full Immersion: Thanks to the absence of loading screens, transitions between planets, space stations, and ships are instantaneous, enhancing the sense of presence in the vast reaches of space.

  • Multiplayer Mode: Interact with thousands of players around the world, form alliances, wage wars, and trade resources that affect the economy and political situation of the universe.

  • Dynamic Events: The world of the game is constantly changing due to the actions of players, creating an ever-evolving and unpredictable game environment.

Verse Project offers not just a game, but a new immersive experience where every detail has been thought out to create a sense of reality and depth to the space adventure.
detailed_description:
DEMO ACCESS

We invite you to dive into the early version of Verse Project — a multiplayer space game with a vast open world. The technical demo offers a unique chance to explore the game’s core, including the flight system and world interactions, which will evolve with the community.

Please note that this is an early version and may change significantly.

Get demo access now on the game’s official website, or wait for the Steam Playtest launch coming soon. Begin your space journey and be part of shaping the universe!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required.

  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3070 Ti or Radeon RX 6800 XT

short_description: In this multiplayer game you have to explore the Solar System in real scale. Control spaceships of the near future, explore planets, moons and asteroids, mine resources, fight for space domination and build the future of the universe.
